### Description

Exceptions thrown within guava event handlers are automatically trapped and logged.  It was fine for early development, but we do not want to continue this going into production. 

This is what happens when an assert (defined in the spec) is triggered:

```
Sep 03, 2019 5:52:17 PM com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus$LoggingHandler handleException
SEVERE: Exception thrown by subscriber method onBlock(tech.pegasys.artemis.datastructures.blocks.BeaconBlock) on subscriber tech.pegasys.artemis.statetransition.StateProcessor@6ba060f3 when dispatching event: tech.pegasys.artemis.datastructures.blocks.BeaconBlock@8817775e
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: on_block: Parent block state is not contained in block_state
 at com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkArgument(Preconditions.java:141)
 at tech.pegasys.artemis.statetransition.util.ForkChoiceUtil.on_block(ForkChoiceUtil.java:181)
 at tech.pegasys.artemis.statetransition.StateProcessor.onBlock(StateProcessor.java:168)
 at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
 at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:62)
 at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
 at java.base/java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:566)
 at com.google.common.eventbus.Subscriber.invokeSubscriberMethod(Subscriber.java:87)
 at com.google.common.eventbus.Subscriber$SynchronizedSubscriber.invokeSubscriberMethod(Subscriber.java:144)
 at com.google.common.eventbus.Subscriber$1.run(Subscriber.java:72)
 at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1128)
 at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:628)
 at java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:834)
```
#### Possible Solution 
* creating a class implementing the SubscriberExceptionHandler interface
* pass an instance to the EventBus's constructor

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/33599690/google-guava-eventbus-and-exceptions-in-event-handlers/35682964#35682964
